posts.description: The Antiwar Activist Who Helped Make Donald Trump Possible - Bloomberg Politics
posts.extended: In late January, Donald Trump held one of his final rallies before the Iowa caucuses at the Dubuque airport. On the tarmac, with loudspeakers blasting the theme from the Harrison Ford movie Air Force One, a crowd of shivering supporters roared when Trumpâ€™s Boeing 757 made a flyby.

Faced with the possibility of a rail strike starting next weekend, New Jersey commuters are increasingly worried about a shutdown that could paralyze the region and send them scrambling to find a way into New York City.

posts.description: What Prison Guards Really Think About Their Jobs | The Marshall Project
posts.extended: Unpredictable inmates. Long hours. Incapable bosses. These are just some of the challenges of working as a corrections officer.
